name: Battle of the Squares (Gaming Project at VT)
name_original: Battle of the Squares (Gaming Project at VT)
description:
Protect your base from the attacking dice! Choose the placement of your towers carefully to defend from the enemy waves!

Controls:
Use the mouse to select towers and place them.
Knights can be moved by selecting them first, then clicking on an empty square.

Credits:
Mateo de la Rosa : Programming
Harrison Davis: Background and UI Art, Assistant Programming, Music, Sound Design
Maddie Haley: Art
Kurtis St. Thomas: Special Effects, Assistant Programing
Rishon Elliott: UI, Programming

Made during the Spring 2023 Gaming Project Game Jam with the theme Toss of the Dice.
